item.title: Free amigurrumi Pattern Ant
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐⭐ SIZE: 8" / 20 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. Ant pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in red, blue, white and brown Size C-2 / 2.75 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (10 mm) White embroidery thread Yarn needle Fiberfill for stuffing Optional: metal wire / pipe cleaner eye white (make 2, in white yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Don’t pull the magic ring too tightly.
